item.title: 节后获利回吐导致美国玉米、大豆和小麦价格下跌
item.description: 周二，谷物和油籽期货下跌，原因是美国劳动节假期结束后市场重新开盘，获利了结帮助削减了上周五的涨幅。【原文：Grain and oilseed futures fell Tuesday amid profit taking that helped pare back Friday’s gains as the market reopened from the US Labor Day holiday.】

item.title: 王丹世界观获胜
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 派拉蒙将根据《使命召唤》游戏系列制作电影
item.description: 派拉蒙 Skydance 公司周二发表声明说，该公司已与微软公司的动视视频游戏部门达成协议，将开发和制作一部以《使命召唤》系列为题材的真人电影。【原文：Paramount Skydance Corp. has struck a deal with Microsoft Corp.’s Activision video-game unit to develop and produce a live-action film based on the Call of Duty franchise, the company said in a statement Tuesday.】

item.title: 欧洲单日债券销售额达到创纪录的 496 亿欧元
item.description: 随着英国和意大利推出巨额交易，欧洲债券市场的发行量将创下历史新高，在经历了夏季的冷清之后，九月的融资热潮将由此拉开序幕。【原文：Europe’s bond market is set to notch a record day of issuance as the UK and Italy offered jumbo deals, kickstarting a September rush for funding after a summer lull.】

item.title: 泰尔支持的无人机制造商量子系统公司将寻求 30 亿欧元估值
item.description: 量子系统公司（Quantum Systems）是一家由彼得-蒂尔（Peter Thiel）支持的德国无人机制造商，今年将寻求以高达 30 亿欧元（35 亿美元）的估值进行融资。【原文：Quantum Systems, a German drone maker backed by Peter Thiel, will seek to raise money at a valuation of as much as €3 billion ($3.5 billion) this year.】

item.title: 区块链贷款公司 Figure 和支持者在首次公开募股中寻求 5.26 亿美元资金
item.description: 基于区块链的信贷公司Figure Technology Solutions Inc.及其部分支持者正寻求在首次公开募股中筹集5.26亿美元。【原文：Blockchain-based credit company Figure Technology Solutions Inc. and some of its backers are seeking to raise $526 million in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 美国在打击伊朗石油出口的最新行动中将矛头指向伊拉克大亨
item.description: 美国对一名被指控帮助伊朗逃避石油出口限制的伊拉克大亨实施制裁，这是针对德黑兰能源贸易的一系列行动中的最新举措。【原文：The US imposed sanctions on an Iraqi tycoon accused of helping Iran evade restrictions on its oil exports, the latest in a series of moves targeting Tehran’s energy trade.】

item.title: 巴西法官开始审理博尔索纳罗案，誓言对抗特朗普威胁
item.description: 受美国制裁的巴西最高法院法官开始了对前总统博尔索纳罗的审判，他发誓要坚决抵制来自华盛顿的压力。【原文：The Brazilian Supreme Court Judge sanctioned by the US opened the trial of former President Jair Bolsonaro vowing to stand firm against pressure from Washington.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长维勒鲁瓦称欧元区通胀处于可控范围内
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，通货膨胀已得到很好的控制，经济增长符合预期。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau said inflation is well under control and economic growth is in line with forecasts.】

item.title: 非洲的粮食需求和债务成本给贷款人带来噩梦
item.description: 全球发展领导者警告说，非洲最贫穷的国家正竭力举债投资农业，并日益面临偿还高额贷款或养活本国人民的严峻选择。【原文：Africa’s poorest countries are struggling to take on more debt to invest in agriculture and are increasingly faced with the stark choice of paying off costly loans or feeding their people, global development leaders have warned.】

item.title: 墨西哥石油公司提出用墨西哥政府的现金回购债券
item.description: 据一份声明称，墨西哥石油公司（Petroleos Mexicanos SA）将用墨西哥政府筹集的现金回购价值约 100 亿美元的全球债券。【原文：Petroleos Mexicanos SA is offering to buy back some $10 billion worth of its global bonds with cash raised by the Mexican government, according to a statement.】

item.title: 特朗普能源部长称高额电费是他最关心的问题
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的能源主管表示，美国电价飙升是他最担心的问题，分析人士警告说，公用事业账单可能成为共和党人的政治负担。【原文：President Donald Trump’s energy chief says soaring US electricity prices are his biggest concern, remarks that come as analysts warn utility bills could become a political liability for Republicans.】

item.title: 阿根廷干预外汇市场，大选不安情绪令市场躁动不安
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）在周日的一次关键投票前遭遇了一系列政治和经济挫折，阿根廷财政部表示将对货币市场进行干预。【原文：Argentina’s Treasury said it was going to intervene in the currency market as the nation’s assets sank amid a series of political and economic setbacks for President Javier Milei ahead of a key vote on Sunday.】

item.title: InPost 股价暴跌，与 Allegro 的配送纠纷升级
item.description: InPost SA 的股价跌至近两年来的最低点，此前这家波兰包裹柜运营商报告称，由于与电子商务公司 Allegro.eu SA 就投递方式发生争执，其在波兰国内的投递量增长放缓。【原文：InPost SA shares fell to the lowest in almost two years after the Polish parcel locker operator reported slowing volume growth in its home country amid a spat with e-commerce company Allegro.eu SA over delivery options.】

item.title: 美国 8 月份制造业活动连续第六个月萎缩
item.description: 美国 8 月份工厂活动连续第六个月萎缩，原因是生产回落，这表明制造业仍处于停滞状态。【原文：US factory activity shrank in August for a sixth straight month, driven by a pullback in production that shows manufacturing remains bogged down.】

item.title: 欧盟担心特朗普反弹，推迟对谷歌广告技术的罚款
item.description: 由于担心美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）可能会通过破坏一项跨大西洋贸易协议来进行反击，欧盟暂停了立即惩罚 Alphabet 公司旗下谷歌滥用其广告技术主导地位的计划。【原文：The European Union paused its immediate plans to punish Alphabet Inc.’s Google for abusing its dominance over advertising technology amid fears that US President Donald Trump could hit back by derailing a transatlantic trade deal.】

item.title: 科技股跌势加剧，收益率攀升令美股下滑
item.description: 周二，美国股市下跌，延续了上周五的跌势，原因是大型科技公司股价下跌，而 10 年期国债在企业发行量增加的压力下走高。【原文：US stocks fell on Tuesday, extending losses from Friday as Big Tech names declined and 10-year Treasuries advanced, pressured by mounting corporate issuance.】

item.title: 国债收益率上升，30 年期国债收益率接近 5%，全球债券市场低迷
item.description: 随着交易员结束长周末假期归来，欧洲长期债券溃败，公司债券销售日历激增，美国国债承压。【原文：US Treasuries were under pressure amid a rout in long-dated European bonds and a surging calendar of corporate debt sales as traders returned from the holiday long weekend.】

item.title: 默克利用美国投资级债券市场收购维罗纳公司
item.description: 默克公司（Merck & Co.【原文：Merck & Co. is selling investment-grade corporate bonds Tuesday to help fund its acquisition of fellow drugmaker Verona Pharma Plc, as more than a dozen firms kick off a seasonally busy period for debt markets.】

item.title: 诺和诺德获丹麦重要投资者支持，制药商寻求复兴
item.description: 丹麦最大的养老基金今年增持了诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）的股份，押注这家肥胖症药品生产商将在美国市场以外的市场超越竞争对手。【原文：Denmark’s largest pension fund has boosted its stake in Novo Nordisk A/S this year, betting the obesity drugmaker will outpace rivals beyond the US market where its struggles have led to two profit warnings.】

item.title: Underdog、Crypto.com 启动 NFL 和 NBA 体育预测市场
item.description: Underdog 和 Crypto.com 将推出一项服务，让球迷通过预测市场对体育比赛结果进行投注。【原文：Underdog and Crypto.com are launching a service that will let fans make bets on sports outcomes via a prediction market.】

item.title: 反对党高级领导人下台后土耳其资产暴跌
item.description: 土耳其一家法院下令撤销主要反对党伊斯坦布尔行政机构的职务，导致当地资产缩水。【原文：A Turkish court has ordered the removal of the main opposition party’s Istanbul administration, leading to a slump in local assets.】

item.title: 阿纳多卢埃菲斯与百威英博在俄罗斯的合资公司重新命名后业绩下滑
item.description: 土耳其酿酒商 Anadolu Efes 与 Anheuser-Busch InBev 在俄罗斯的合资企业重新命名后，Anadolu Efes 的股价创下五个多月来的最大跌幅，这加深了人们对该公司可能无法重新获得业务控制权的担忧。【原文：Shares in Anadolu Efes dropped by the most in over five months after the Turkish brewer’s Russian joint venture with Anheuser-Busch InBev was rebranded, deepening concerns that it may not regain control of the business.】

item.title: 拜登命令撤销后，ICE 将获得 Paragon 间谍软件
item.description: 在特朗普政府放弃拜登时代的一项命令后，美国移民和海关执法局有望获得有争议的间谍软件，该软件旨在入侵手机和读取私人信息。【原文：US Immigration and Customs Enforcement is on track to gain access to controversial spyware designed to hack phones and read private messages after the Trump administration jettisoned a Biden-era order.】

item.title: Varonis 拟以 1.5 亿美元收购电子邮件安全公司 SlashNext
item.description: 数据安全公司 Varonis Systems Inc. 已同意以高达 1.5 亿美元的价格收购基于人工智能的电子邮件安全提供商 SlashNext，其中包括基于业绩的保留奖励。【原文：Data security company Varonis Systems Inc. has agreed to acquire SlashNext, an AI-based email security provider, for as much as $150 million including performance-based retention awards.】

item.title: 美国撤销台积电对中国芯片供应出货的豁免权
item.description: 美国撤销了台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：The US has revoked Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.’s authorization to freely ship essential gear to its main Chinese chipmaking base, potentially curtailing its production capabilities at that older-generation facility.】

item.title: 捷豹路虎遭遇网络事件，生产受到影响
item.description: 捷豹路虎表示，本周发生的一起网络事件 "严重扰乱 "了其零售和生产活动。【原文：Jaguar Land Rover said a cyber incident had “severely disrupted” its retail and production activities this week.】

item.title: 穆巴达拉支持的 Corient 收购英国财富管理公司 Stonehage 和 Stanhope
item.description: 美国财富管理公司 Corient 同意收购 Stonehage Fleming 和 Stanhope Capital，使这家由穆巴达拉支持的公司管理的资产几乎翻了一番。【原文：US wealth manager Corient agreed to acquire Stonehage Fleming and Stanhope Capital, allowing the Mubadala-backed firm to almost double assets under management.】

item.title: Vogue 任命克洛伊-马勒接替安娜-温图尔成为新任美国编辑
item.description: 康泰纳仕旗下的《Vogue》杂志任命克洛伊-马勒（Chloe Malle）为美国编辑内容负责人和安娜-温图尔（Anna Wintour）的继任者。【原文：Condé Nast’s Vogue magazine named Chloe Malle as the head of US editorial content and the successor to Anna Wintour, who led the magazine for nearly four decades and elevated it further as a fashion powerhouse.】

item.title: 法国兴业银行评估布尔索银行面对 Revolut 推动的战略
item.description: 法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）正在重新考虑其对法国数字贷款公司布尔索银行（BoursoBank）的战略，因为价值 750 亿美元的金融科技巨头 Revolut 有限公司（Revolut Ltd.）即将发起挑战。【原文：Societe Generale SA is reconsidering its strategy for French digital lender BoursoBank, amid the oncoming challenge from $75 billion fintech giant Revolut Ltd.】
